attributes.action: Trial the drug IVORMECTIN  for the treatment of Covid.
attributes.additional_details: IVORMECTIN is cheap to administer because it is generic. It is also safe for use having been around for 40 years. It is being used with some success in India, Mexico, Peru and other southern hemisphere countries to treat Covid 19.  Why is our government and SAGE ignoring it?
attributes.background: The government and SAGE should set up a full clinical trial of the generic drug IVORMECTIN for treating Covid 19,  without delay

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase research funding into the use of Ivermectin as a treatment for Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571040
